name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BitSmall: share gifs, and videos easily

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BitSmall allows you to send gifs, images, videos and files from Gmail to youtube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
share images, videos, and files on all social media and other websites in the comments section more easily.

Platforms(website) Bitsmall can be used :
BitSmall work on every website.

some benefits of BitSmall are 
○ share your files more easily
○ no need to upload the same photo on different websites when you can upload it on BitSmall and use it everywhere.
○ control your media files more easily.
○ access other images, and videos from all around the world.
